mapper.insert: insert into sysinfo (node_id, sys_no, sys_password, sys_name, sys_nick, sys_engnish_name, sys_engnish_nick, sys_access_domains, sys_access_token_timeout, sys_refresh_token_timeout, sys_show_flag, sys_authentication_method, sys_server_address, sys_server_port, sys_create_people_id, sys_create_people_type, sys_create_time, sys_updata_time, parent_id) values (#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysEngnishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysEngnishNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysAccessDomains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysAccessTokenTimeout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRefreshTokenTimeout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysShowFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysAuthenticationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysServerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysServerPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreatePeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreatePeopleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUpdataTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sysinfo set sys_no = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_password = #{sysPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_name = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_nick = #{sysNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_engnish_name = #{sysEngnishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_engnish_nick = #{sysEngnishNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_access_domains = #{sysAccessDomains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_access_token_timeout = #{sysAccessTokenTimeout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_refresh_token_timeout = #{sysRefreshTokenTimeout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_show_flag = #{sysShowFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_authentication_method = #{sysAuthenticationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_server_address = #{sysServerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_server_port = #{sysServerPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_create_people_id = #{sysCreatePeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_create_people_type = #{sysCreatePeopleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_create_time = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_updata_time = #{sysUpdataTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select node_id, sys_no, sys_password, sys_name, sys_nick, sys_engnish_name, sys_engnish_nick, sys_access_domains, sys_access_token_timeout, sys_refresh_token_timeout, sys_show_flag, sys_authentication_method, sys_server_address, sys_server_port, sys_create_people_id, sys_create_people_type, sys_create_time, sys_updata_time, parent_id from sysinfo where node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select node_id, sys_no, sys_password, sys_name, sys_nick, sys_engnish_name, sys_engnish_nick, sys_access_domains, sys_access_token_timeout, sys_refresh_token_timeout, sys_show_flag, sys_authentication_method, sys_server_address, sys_server_port, sys_create_people_id, sys_create_people_type, sys_create_time, sys_updata_time, parent_id from sysinfo
mapper.sql: node_id nodeId, sys_no sysNo, sys_password sysPassword, sys_name sysName, sys_nick sysNick, sys_engnish_name sysEngnishName, sys_engnish_nick sysEngnishNick, sys_access_domains sysAccessDomains, sys_access_token_timeout sysAccessTokenTimeout, sys_refresh_token_timeout sysRefreshTokenTimeout, sys_show_flag sysShowFlag, sys_authentication_method sysAuthenticationMethod, sys_server_address sysServerAddress, sys_server_port sysServerPort, sys_create_people_id sysCreatePeopleId, sys_create_people_type sysCreatePeopleType, sys_create_time sysCreateTime, parent_id parentId
mapper.select: select sys_no from sysinfo order by sys_no desc
